parameter.name: th1
parameter.description: Threshold corresponding to the first similarity measure (cosine).

parameter.name: th2
parameter.description: Threshold corresponding to the second similarity measure (dice).

parameter.name: th3
parameter.description: Threshold corresponding to the third similarity measure (cosine).

parameter.name: src_gap
parameter.description: Maximun gap between sentences in the source document taken as adjacents.

parameter.name: src_gap_least
parameter.description: Minimum value that src_gap can take after several iterations.

parameter.name: susp_gap
parameter.description: Maximun gap between sentences in the suspicious document taken as adjacents.

parameter.name: susp_gap_least
parameter.description: Minimum value that susp_gap can take after several iterations.

parameter.name: verbatim_minlen
parameter.description: Minimum length in characters of common substring (using words) between both documents to consider to be a verbatim obfuscation case.

parameter.name: src_size
parameter.description: Minimum amount of sentences in a plagiarism case in the side of source document.

parameter.name: susp_size
parameter.description: Minimum amount of sentences in a plagiarism case in the side of suspicious document.

parameter.name: min_sentlen
parameter.description: Minimum amount of words allowed in a senteces. If less, the sentence is anexed to the next sentence.

parameter.name: min_plaglen
parameter.description: Minimum amount of chacarters allowed in each side of a plagiarism case.

parameter.name: rssent
parameter.description: 0: Annex small sententces to the next, Other: Remove small sentences.

parameter.name: tf_idf_p
parameter.description: Define if computing tf_idf or just tf. 0: Use tf 1: Compute tf-idf

parameter.name: rem_sw
parameter.description: Define the treatment of stopwords. 0: Do not remove stopwords 1: Remove 50 more common stopwords Other:Remove all stopwords

parameter.name: verbatim
parameter.description: Define if using the verbatim detection method. 0: Do not use it Other: Use it

parameter.name: summary
parameter.description: Define if using the summary detection method. 0: Do not use it Other: Use it

parameter.name: src_gap_summary
parameter.description: src_gap for the summary detection method

parameter.name: susp_gap_summary
parameter.description: susp_gap for the summary detection method
